About Me

I'm a recent graduate from the Flatiron School Bootcamp and I have a Bachelor's Degree in Biology from Hunter College in NYC. Studying biology demanded a sharp attention to detail; problem-solving and thinking critically are essential in understanding even the simplest concepts. Front-end web development allowed me to take these skills and apply them in a more creative field. I'm looking to begin my career as a full-time software engineer and I'm open to most opportunities!

My Projects


SpaceLog

Built with JS, HTML, and CSS, SpaceLog is a site that fetches the latest articles from the SpaceFlightNews API and organizes them for viewers.

Github


Workout

An app built with a Ruby on Rails back-end and a React / Redux front-end. It allows users to sign up, login, and keep track of their workouts. Full CRUD functionality.

Github


Game Review

Gamers can sign up and login securely with their Google Accounts using OAuth in order to start reviewing their favorite video games. Users can add games to review, review any game on the site, edit/delete their reviews, and read other users' reviews. This app was built entirely with Ruby on Rails.

Github
